game.s_dis: Granny is a chilling horror escape game where you must survive and escape from a creepy house without making noise or getting caught by Granny.
game.l_dis:
Play Granny Unblocked – Escape the Horror House

Granny is a terrifying survival horror game where you find yourself trapped inside the house of a sinister, sharp-eared old woman. You have five days to escape by solving puzzles, finding hidden items, and quietly moving through the house. Every noise you make could attract Granny—so move carefully and stay out of sight!

What is Granny?

In Granny, the goal is simple but deadly—escape the house before Granny finds you. She hears everything, from a creaking floorboard to a dropped object, and will rush toward any sound. You’ll need to explore rooms, unlock doors, and use clever strategies to avoid detection and survive. The tension rises each day as Granny’s traps and vigilance increase.

How to Play Granny

  • Move Quietly: Use the keyboard to move and crouch to avoid making noise.
  • Search for Items: Collect keys, tools, and clues to unlock doors and solve puzzles.
  • Hide When Necessary: Use closets, under beds, or dark corners to evade Granny.
  • Plan Your Escape: Every action matters—one mistake can alert Granny and end your run.
  • Survive Five Days: You have limited time to escape before it’s too late.

Why Play Granny Unblocked?

Play Granny unblocked for free online and experience one of the most iconic horror escape games right in your browser. No downloads needed—just pure suspense and strategy as you navigate the terrifying house and try to outsmart Granny.

Key Features

  • Stealth-Based Gameplay: Stay quiet to survive and move unnoticed.
  • Challenging Puzzles: Find keys, unlock secrets, and uncover the escape route.
  • Realistic Horror Atmosphere: Dark visuals and eerie sounds that build tension.
  • Unblocked Version: Play anywhere, anytime, with no restrictions.
  • Five-Day Challenge: Limited time adds to the pressure and thrill.

Escape or Be Caught!

Granny is a must-play for horror fans who love stealth, tension, and puzzle-solving. Can you outsmart the terrifying Granny and escape her deadly home before time runs out? Enter if you dare—and remember to stay quiet!
